rewardPokemon.name: Charmander
rewardPokemon.description: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

rewardItem.name: Timer Ball
rewardItem.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes progressively more effective at catching Pokémon the closer the Pokémon is to escaping.

missions.name: Wondertrade Pokémon with less than 383 BST

rewardItem.name: Electric Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

missions.name: Use field effects in a battle

rewardItem.name: Empty Disc
rewardItem.description: An empty disc used to teach your Pokémon a full new move set. Use it with caution.

rewardItem.name: Shimmering Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve.
